section.p: Mevenide (Maven IDE Integration) aims at integrating Maven into standard IDEs. Currently only Eclipse is targeted.

Mevenide is a work in progress ; see the current status. Putting the site into CVS is perhaps bad practice, however it is yet quite practice yo share ideas. We should put a wiki already put a wiki on mevenide.sf.net to share ideas.

See also the Getting Started doc if you want to contribute.
Please feel free to comment on that build process.
